name: InterSlider.
author: Karol Polakowski Interkod

sections.description:
InterSlider is a responsive and customizable slider made in jQuery.

See working demo.

About InterSlider

  • Responsive slider
  • Various options to manipulate apearance and performance of slider
  • Coming up soon : new transition effects, new options
sections.installation:
1. Download plugin and unpack it.
  2. Upload inter-slider folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. There are two ways of puting slider on your site
    • Insert <?php do_action('inter_slider'); ?> in your template
    • Go to Appearance -> Widgets and drag InterSlider widget to the sidebar of your chose
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First version of plugin. Contains two transition types to choose, and various apearance options to manipulate.

1.1

  • Fixed many bugs. Slider is now loading after dom three is loaded.
